argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | funcringcsetcOLD.r | |- R = ( RingCatOLD ` U ) |
| 2 |  | funcringcsetcOLD.s | |- S = ( SetCat ` U ) |
| 3 |  | funcringcsetcOLD.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | funcringcsetcOLD.c | |- C = ( Base ` S ) |
| 5 |  | funcringcsetcOLD.u | |- ( ph -> U e. WUni ) |
| 6 |  | funcringcsetcOLD.f | |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. B |-> ( Base ` x ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. B ) -> F = ( x e. B |-> ( Base ` x ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = X -> ( Base ` x ) = ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( ph /\ X e. B ) /\ x = X ) -> ( Base ` x ) = ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. B ) -> X e. B ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` X ) e. _V |
| 12 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. B ) -> ( Base ` X ) e. _V ) |
| 13 | 7, 9, 10, 12 | #P_fvmptd | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. B ) -> ( F ` X ) = ( Base ` X ) ) |
